commentBody:
If someone out there can find a way to break into an iPhone to help the FBI, surely there is someone out there who can write some software that could be used by victims like DiCaro and Sarah Spain to filter out troll garbage when they go to Twitter or other social media platforms.

Or how about just having a few big name athletes (e.g., Steph Curry): (1) do an infomercial condemning the trolls; (2) do an interview together with female sports writers in which they condemn the trolls; (3) send out tweets to their fans condemning the trolls; (4) wash, rinse repeat.
